Package io.goobi.viewer.model.calendar

Class CalendarView

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.goobi.viewer.model.calendar.CalendarView
  • public class CalendarView
extends Object
    Data for the calendar view of an individual record (e.g. newspaper).
